required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Risk Factors for Potential Drug -Drug Interactions: Study in Surgical Intensive Care Unit -Zagazig University Hospitals.
clinical_study.official_title: Risk Factors for Potential Drug -Drug Interactions: Study in Surgical Intensive Care Unit -Zagazig University Hospitals

brief_summary.textblock: Drug drug interactions is frequent in critically ill patients due to polypharmacy, different drug groups and prolonged ICU or hospital stay

detailed_description.textblock:
This cross sectional study was conducted in Surgical ICU, zagazig University Hospital for 6months period.
Demographic data (age, gender),clinical history data (main diagnosis, ICU stay in days, transfer from emergency room or other departments, on mechanical ventilation or not, state of consciousness

primary_outcome.measure: Severity of Drug interactions by Lexicomp interactions application
primary_outcome.description: Lexicomp interactions classified As: A(no known interactions) B(no action needed) C(monitor therapy) D(consider therapy modification) X (avoid combination)

primary_outcome.measure: Severity of Drug interactions by Medescape interactions checker:
primary_outcome.description: Interactions classified with Medescape interactions checker as :(contraindicated, serious use alternative, monitor closely,minor)

intervention.intervention_name: Survey for drug drug interactions on medscape and lexicomp applications
intervention.description: Survey for drug drug interactions on Medscape and Lexicomp interaction checker applications

study_pop.textblock: All patients admitted to Surgical ICUs, zagazig University Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all patients admitted to Surgical ICUs for six months period
Exclusion Criteria:
- less than one day admission to ICU,not completed data

patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Easy, direct information are available for other researchers
